plot: Sparkling Red Star takes place in 1937, amidst the Red Army's Long March. It stars a ten year old child named Pan Dongzi, whose life becomes quite difficult after his father is captured and subsequently rescued by the Red Army.
title: Shanshan de hongxin haizi de tiankong
plot_es: Sparkling Red Star takes place in 1937, amidst the Red Army's Long March. It stars a ten year old child named Pan Dongzi, whose life becomes quite difficult after his father is captured and subsequently rescued by the Red Army.
original_name: Shanshan de hongxin haizi de tiankong
